title: Network of Layer 2 Networks
sub-title: Tokamak Network helps people join the decentralized world

challenge.title: Challenge
challenge.content1: Ethereum, a powerful platform for decentralized applications, has limitations.
challenge.content2: Various Layer 2 solutions are emerging in effort to tackle such challenges. All layer 2 solutions are excellent; however, a protocol that safely connects different layer 2 solutions to expand and improve the ecosystem does not exist yet. This slows down the application and improvement of layer 2, causing fragmentation of the ecosystem.

comparison.title: Comparison
comparison.description: Simple comparison with other L2 protocols or frameworks

opru.title: Optimistic Rollups
opru.description: Layer 2 solution with on-chain data computed off-chain. Its validity is verified with a fraud-proof system.

zk-rollup.title: zk Rollups
zk-rollup.description: Layer-2 solution with on-chain data computed off-chain. Its validity is always fully verified with validity proof (a.k.a. zero knowledge proof)

plasma.title: Tokamak Plasma
plasma.description: Fully EVM-compatible Plasma implementation secured with continuous-rebase.

solution.title: Solution
solution.content1: Tokamak Network is a network of Layer 2 networks; a protocol and a platform that easily and securely builds and connects Layer 2 networks.
solution.list2: Support all types of layer 2 protocols
solution.list3: Ensure full verification from day one within Tokamak Network ecosystem
solution.list4: Support interoperability via Cross-layer Message Protocol
